generalInformation: Sugar pea that produces large pods, approximately 9-10 cm long. May require support. Harvest gradually, before the pods become round. It's advisable to cultivate peas in different locations each year; they enrich the soil.
preCultivation: Early, as soon as the soil can be worked. 3 cm deep. Soak the seeds for a few hours before sowing. Water the furrow before sowing. Keep the sowing moist until the seeds germinate. 6cm apart
